text:
Hi fam :)
I have created a landing page in HubSpot and it's working as expected
But I want to create another landing page with a different header and I cant find how to do it :disappointed:
Can someone help me please?
are you using a template from a theme or the old template style?

but now I have different issue

and I am trying to call the global module from sprout rocket into custom template but it is not showing on this list
do you have any idea on this?
I don't really, I'm not super well versed on the sprout rocket theme
